attributes.action: All NHS workers to get a “Campaign Medal” as all British forces do!
attributes.additional_details: There is absolutely no difference in a soldier patrolling an active war zone with the threat of IEDs, sniper fire, firefights etc to a member of staff of the NHS working and fighting against this virus and putting themselves in harms way for the good of the people of this great Country every day with the added risk to their families to worry about also.
attributes.background: I would like the British Government to award all frontline NHS workers and carers a “Campaign medal” just like British Forces receive when on active operations due to their unwavering efforts during the COVID-19 Pandemic. The NHS staff are behind enemy lines serving their country!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302613

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
